name: CowboysShowdown
description:
The Wild West is a place where you can find a lot of cowboys who strive to take your life. Each of them is especially dangerous and must be destroyed. The bounty hunter has a lot of places to roam here.

Cowboys Showdown is a platforming shooter with waves of enemies, bounty hunters and high-ranking criminals who will be well paid to kill. Boxes with bonuses and the ability to buy new weapons will help you in your hard work.

Game Features:
- hardcore
- Pleasant musical accompaniment
-Pixel Art
